MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH13 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.54am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35 PM on Tuesday, 02 February 2021
